title: The Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott. (Supplementary volume: containing notes, historical and illustrative, by the author, glossary, etc.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: "A few days after the battle of Tippermuir, whenMontrose with his army was encamped at Collace,an entertainment was given by him to his officers,in honour of the victory he had obtained, and Kilpont and his comrade Ardvoirlich were of the party.
